answers.answer: I had it with my first. It's a possible sign of preeclampsia. Talk to your dr about it.
My right hand does this and fingers go numb, doc said that it could be pregnancy induced carpal tunnel.
Yeah my fingers go numb but it's not all my fingers at once, but I have a appt on Monday

My hands are numb all the time and they wake me up at night hurting terribly.  Midwife says its normal.  Try drinking lots of water with lemon or lime juice, that seems to help me.  Also,  icing my hands, wrists to finger tips, seems to alleviate it some for me.

question: Any one hands swollen and they ache a lil. First time I've hand this, 4th pregnancy.
title: swollen hands that ache
